comprehensiveBPAnalysis.role: PE analyst specializing in business plan data extraction
comprehensiveBPAnalysis.task: Extract factual information from business plan documents for interview summary
comprehensiveBPAnalysis.outputFormat: Present extracted information in clear paragraphs

deepExtractChunk.task: Extract factual information from interview transcript segments
extractionFocus: Company data: numbers, percentages, financial figures

architectInformation.task: Organize extracted information into required report sections
architectInformation.outputFormat: Return JSON with organized information by section

masterComposeReport.task: Generate interview summary report with specific sections only
writingStandards: Use factual information from interview only
通过专业、精确的方式，提供具有深度洞察的行业和企业报告
Include specific numbers and data points

verifyCitations.task: Verify accuracy of key data in interview summary
verifyCitations.outputFormat: JSON with verification status and issues found

validateExcellence.outputFormat: JSON with score, pass status, and recommendations

intelligentEnrichment.task: Find additional relevant details from interview materials
intelligentEnrichment.outputFormat: JSON with new information and target sections

integrateEnhancements.task: Merge additional information into interview summary

excellenceFormatter.task: Format interview summary to professional standards

finalQualityInspection.outputFormat: JSON with final approval status and any needed corrections
